availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry H. Suddeth (Henry County, Kentucky, cabinet maker.)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, cabinet maker. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Voires Suddeth. Father of Jane N. Suddeth, Mary C. Suddeth, Martha A. Suddeth, Julia Suddeth, David E. Suddeth, Anna Suddeth, Elizabeth Suddeth, Yonella Suddeth, and Martha Suddeth. Cabinet maker in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Henry County in 1850. Cabinet Maker in Henry County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 395A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 241.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 198A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Jericho, p. 304A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 22749.
